marklogic.body: I agree with you the midfield lost defensive shape and ran out of legs in last 15 minutes needs get the Act together now midfield as well as cole he didn't put the ball to corner and conceded second goal he was much cautious against Befinca may be due midweek Benfica away game BUT needs to concentrate now Chelsea are hanging by thread in battle for 4th Spot and champs league and fa cup any wrong move could be catastrope agree with you.But Chelsea shouldn't concentrate on probable opponents just take one game at a time.Go Go Chelsea
